description:
Tame the terrain with the Mescalito Trk GTX, Scarpa's latest trail boot offering ideal support for rugged trails and long days in the mountains. Inspired by Scarpa's approach shoe expertise, the Mescalito TRK GTX takes it to the next level with a dual-density PU midsole for long-lasting support and cushioning under heavier loads, while the Vibram outsole will stand up to the toughest trails you encounter.

The durable suede upper is supportive and backed by Gore-tex for guaranteed waterproof protection, and features a stretch fabric collar and flex-zone for high-mileage comfort that lasts.
name: Scarpa Mescalito Trek GTX - Mens
